endpoints.name: register
endpoints.description: Register new user with email and password via Supabase Auth

endpoints.name: login
endpoints.description: Authenticate user with email and password via Supabase Auth

endpoints.name: refresh_access_token
endpoints.description: Refresh access token using refresh token

endpoints.name: logout
endpoints.description: Logout user and invalidate session

endpoints.name: get_current_user_info
endpoints.description: Get current user info from JWT token including profile data

endpoints.name: get_profile
endpoints.description: Get current user's profile data

endpoints.name: update_current_user_profile
endpoints.description: Update current user's profile data

endpoints.name: forgot_password
endpoints.description: Request password reset email via Supabase

endpoints.name: reset_password
endpoints.description: Reset password with token from email

endpoints.name: verify_user_email
endpoints.description: Verify user email with token from email

endpoints.name: resend_verification
endpoints.description: Resend email verification link

endpoints.name: change_user_password
endpoints.description: Change user password (requires current password)

endpoints.name: request_password_reset_legacy
endpoints.description: Legacy endpoint - use /forgot-password instead

endpoints.name: change_password_legacy
endpoints.description: Legacy endpoint - use /change-password instead

endpoints.name: get_optional_user_info
endpoints.description: Get user info if authenticated, returns None if not

endpoints.name: dev_login
endpoints.description: Development-only endpoint to create test tokens without email verification

endpoints.name: check_password_strength
endpoints.description: Analyze password strength and get detailed feedback

endpoints.name: list_ingredients
endpoints.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all ingredients from the master database

endpoints.name: get_ingredient
endpoints.description: Retrieve a specific ingredient by its ID from the master table

endpoints.name: create_new_ingredient
endpoints.description: Create a new ingredient in the master table

endpoints.name: update_existing_ingredient
endpoints.description: Update nutritional data or price for an ingredient

endpoints.name: delete_existing_ingredient
endpoints.description: Remove a master ingredient from the database (admin-only operation)

endpoints.name: search_ingredients_by_name
endpoints.description: Search ingredients by name using query parameter

endpoints.name: extract_receipt_text
endpoints.description: Extract raw text from receipt image using OCR

endpoints.name: process_receipt_with_ocr
endpoints.description: Extract text from receipt and provide ingredient matching suggestions

endpoints.name: detailed_health_check
endpoints.description: Comprehensive health check with detailed service status

endpoints.name: quick_health_check
endpoints.description: Fast health check for load balancers

endpoints.name: liveness_probe
endpoints.description: Check if the application is alive

endpoints.name: readiness_probe
endpoints.description: Check if the application is ready to serve requests

endpoints.name: health_metrics
endpoints.description: Get detailed health metrics and statistics

endpoints.name: health_alerts
endpoints.description: Get current health alerts and warnings

endpoints.name: service_health_history
endpoints.description: Get historical health data for services

endpoints.name: update_ingredient_cache_endpoint
endpoints.description: Update the ingredient names cache file from the database

endpoints.name: get_ingredient_cache_status_endpoint
endpoints.description: Get current status and metadata of the ingredient cache

endpoints.name: force_refresh_all_caches_endpoint
endpoints.description: Force refresh all application caches

endpoints.name: root
endpoints.description: Root endpoint for basic application info.
